title: Agua Fresca de Pepino (Cucumber Limeade) Recipe
description: Agua de pepino is a cucumber agua fresca from Mexico made by blending cucumber and fresh lime juice for a simple, light, thirst-quenching drink.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Everyday Cooking Seasonal Summer Drinks Agua Fresca de Pepino (Cucumber Limeade) 4.7 (37) 31 Reviews 17 Photos Agua de pepino is a delicious cucumber agua fresca from Mexico. Serve over ice for a refreshing drink. Submitted by Yoly Updated on August 7, 2022 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 17 17 17 17 Prep Time: 5 mins Total Time: 5 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 5 cups water, divided 3 medium cucumbers, peeled and chopped ½ cup freshly squeezed lime juice 4 tablespoons granular sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®), divided Directions Blend 2 cups water, cucumbers, lime juice, and 2 tablespoons sweetener together in a blender until smooth. Pour into a pitcher; add remaining 3 cups of water. Stir in additional 2 tablespoons of sweetener to taste. Serve over ice. Editor's Note: The magazine version of this recipe may be slightly different than the online version. Please follow directions carefully for whichever version you are using. I Made It Print 93 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Agua Fresca de Pepino (Cucumber Limeade) 01 of 17 Photo by  Allrecipes 02 of 17 Photo by  Shawnte Ellis 04/05/2022 So refreshing and super easy!! The trick is to strain, strain, strain! 03 of 17 Photo by  Genene McNeal 11/07/2020 This is a wonderful healthy beverage. It's good for hydration in this dry desert weather. I doubled the recipe to make a gallon, used monkfruit sweetener and added a splash of lemon juice. Absolutely divine 04 of 17 Photo by  estezz 04/20/2019 Excellent, but I used 1/2 cup real sugar, 2 large cucumbers, and juice of 2 limes. mmmmmmmmmmmmmm 05 of 17 Photo by  Elvira Silva 05/30/2018 06 of 17 Photo by  Tammy Lynn 05/29/2018 Nice flavors, definitely best with ice. It is very pulpy from the cucumber. I had to add a bit more sweetner than called for. I ended up straining out some of the pulp and liked it even better. I will make this again, thanks! 07 of 17 Photo by  lutzflcat 03/19/2018 3.19.18 I love cucumber water, and the addition of that lime juice really enhances the flavor. My cucumber was unwaxed, so I didn’t bother to peel it, that’s why the drink in the photo is so green. Since I don’t like things too sweet these days, I left out the sweetener, and enjoyed the tang of that lime. Spent a couple hours working in the yard this morning, and this cucumber limeade over crushed ice really hit the spot. 08 of 17 Photo by  Leni 09/24/2017 09 of 17 Photo by  Satara Cooley 01/29/2017 10 of 17 Photo by  Liz Dalton 'Lizzie' 03/23/2016 This was great! Very refreshing. I plan to make this again and again through the summer! 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Chamoyada 3 Ratings Agua Fresca de Pitaya (Dragon Fruit) 1 Rating Margaritas with a Bite 11 Ratings Spinach Strawberry Agua Fresca 4 Ratings Pepper-Mint Limeade 30 Ratings Whole Lime Margarita 10 Ratings Margaritas on the Rocks 321 Ratings Agua Fresca de Pina y Espinacas (Pineapple Spinach Agua Fresca) 1 Rating Refreshing Watermelon Margarita 3 Ratings Keto Margarita 21 Ratings Strawberry-Limeade Agua Fresca 2 Ratings Sangrita Fresca (Mexican Sangrita) 1 Rating Mexican Martinis 9 Ratings Chef John's Watermelon Agua Fresca 42 Ratings Orange and Lime Margarita 1 Rating Mexican Strawberry Water (Agua de Fresa) 94 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Yoly
instructions: Blend 2 cups water, cucumbers, lime juice, and 2 tablespoons sweetener together in a blender until smooth.;Pour into a pitcher; add remaining 3 cups of water. Stir in additional 2 tablespoons of sweetener to taste. Serve over ice.
